short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate text into multiple languages simutaneously with chameleonTranslate!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
chameleonTranslate is a multilingual translation web extension that allows you to translate your text into multiple languages at once.

Simply search and select your input and target languages from the dropdowns and start translating!

With support for audio, dictionary definitions and transliterations so you can hear and pronounce words perfectly. 

There is also an option to translate a random word from supported input languages, if you want to test your skills in recognizing its translation in your target languages. 

chameleonTranslate doesnâ€™t require access to any of your tab or personal data, it only modifies your right-click menu to allow for a window popup for the app.

Perfect for multilingual or polyglot language learners. Try it today!
